What is Blackjack?
This is an old card game that has very simple rules but an attractive and interesting game flow. The idea of blackjack is to collect a hand of cards with the total value of 21 or close to it. If a player receives 21 or a value that is higher than the dealer’s one (but no 22 or more), he or she wins. There are a lot of variations of blackjack online and you can enjoy some of them at the Linebet casino.
American Blackjack
This is a classic blackjack game that offers a low house edge of 0.5% only. American blackjack is played with a single deck of 52 cards. The goal is to receive a hand with a total value of 21 or close to it.
European Blackjack
Unlike the classic American version, European blackjack is played with two 52-card decks, which doubles the house edge. On the other hand, to compensate for this, the dealer always stands on soft 17. As for the payout odds, they are 3:2. There is one more deviation that is worth your attention. If both the player and the dealer receive a blackjack (or 21) the game is a tie.
Perfect Pairs
This variation of online casino blackjack contains side bets. It is still played with a single 52-card deck and has the same rules as the American variation, but players can additionally bet on the first two cards be of the same value. Bangladeshi players at Linebet can receive up to 6:1 if they place a such bet in the Perfect Pairs version. If these two cards are not only of the same value but also of the same colour, players receive 12:1. And last but not least, if the two cards are of the same value, colour and suit, gamblers can receive up to 25:1.
Free Bet Blackjack
One of the biggest deviations of this particular version of blackjack online is that players don’t have to put additional money at risk when they split or double down. However, with such an advantage that the gambler receives in this game, there are a couple of catches. For instance, the game results in a push if the score of the dealer is 22. Moreover, the dealer is able to hit on soft 17. To benefit from a free double down, the player must receive an initial hand of 9, 10, or 11. As for splits, they are offered on all paired hands except if the value is ten.
Blackjack Switch
In this version of blackjack, players make two bets of the same size. The idea behind this game is that you can change the switch to the last card dealt to each of your hands so that receive one perfect hand. This significant advantage is compensated with the push outcome when the dealer receives 22. The game is played with six or eight hands, which makes it have a higher house edge.
Multi-Hand Blackjack
By playing this online blackjack variation, you will have one advantageous option, which allows you to handle multiple hands in a single round. The game is played with six 52-card decks. The game can boast of one of the lowest house edges (about 0.47%). Another benefit for gamblers who play Multi-Hand online casino blackjack is that the dealer must stand on soft 17.
Live Casino Blackjack
This is one of the most popular versions of blackjack for Bangladeshi players at the Linebet casino. This isn’t a variation with its deviations from classic blackjack online. How to Play 
To get started, you should log into your account on the 1win platform and proceed to the section with the game.

What is Kabaddi
Kabaddi is a traditional game in India played by 2 teams of 7 people each. There are also 5 spare players. Furthermore, this game is popular in India and Bangladesh, with millions of bettors following domestic and international tournaments.
The game continues until one of the teams loses its members. It takes place on a court divided by a line into two parts. Both teams send players ("raiders") in turns across the middle line to the opponent’s side. The raider needs to tag members of the rival team and return to their side within 30 seconds. Each player touched by the raider brings his team one point if he returns safely.
But the raider must keep yelling "Kabaddi" before crossing the middle and all the time until he makes it back to his team's side. If he stops yelling or takes a breath on the opponent's side, he returns to his team’s side with no points scored. and the defending team gets one point.

After that, the platform creates a betting coupon and sends it to your private account, where you can check its status. As soon as the game finishes, you get the notification about your bet results via the internal message system, and in the email, you mentioned during registration. 
Types of IPL Bets 
Below, you can check the list of the most popular IPL win betting types.
1. The winner of the match. This is the most popular type of betting when watching cricket games. This is also the most convenient option for beginners since you just need to predict the winner of the tournament. Most often, you can choose this variant during the pre-match, but you can do it during in-play betting.
2. Match Handicap. In this case, you are betting on the victory of a particular team with a handicap that is modified as a positive, zero, or negative. 
3. Winner of Coin Toss. This type of betting is also suitable for cricket newbies. In this case, the rate is made on the most probable winner of a particular game.
4. Top Batsman. In this case, during the IPL game, you choose a player with a bat who will make the most runs in the game.
5. Top Bowler. The bet is similar to the previous one; however, you choose a player who will take the most wickets for a certain game or championship in general.
6. Total wickets. Here you put on the total number of wickets in one or all innings during the game.
7. The best performance. In this case, you predict the overall performance of a certain player on the team.
8. 1st Over Total Runs. This is the most popular variety of IPL betting online of the Over/Under bet type when you predict the number of runs during the first inning.
9. Man of the Match. At the end of each game, the most active player is assigned the title "Man of the Match". So you can make the appropriate prediction about it.

Baccarat is a card game that is offered by the Linebet casino in both RNG and live casino versions. The idea here is to guess, which of the two hands will receive a hand, which value is closer to nine. The game involves two hands – the Player and Banker. You need to bet on one of them to start playing.
Classic baccarat is played with a single 52-card deck. However, in some variations of the classic game at the Linebet casino, you will find six or even eight decks. Three-Card Baccarat
Unlike the original version of the game where only two cards are dealt at the beginning of each round, this online variation of baccarat that you can find at the Linebet casino is played with three cards and a single 52-card deck. As for the scoring rules, they remain the same. Face cards are worth 0, while all other cards are worth their face value.
There is also one more deviation in this version of online baccarat. If a hand receives three face cards, it has the highest value. If both hands are tie, the hand with more face cards wins.

At this version of online baccarat at the Linebet casino, you can see the cards revealed by investing more in a single hand. Each time you add more money to your bet, you will be able to see more cards.
